Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

DDK Function: 504H Get Timbre Status

Discussion

Input:

AX = 504H
BX = Driver number
CX = Bank (CH)/patch (CL) specifier to test

Output:

AX = 1: Timbre is present in synthesizer memory or local cache
AX = 0: Timbre is not present in synthesizer memory or local cache

This function returns with AX = 0 if the timbre with bank/patch specifier CX is not currently present in the synthesizer memory or internal timbre cache associated with the driver. This function is intended primarily for diagnostic and optimization purposes.


Group: DOS XMIDI Sound Driver Interface
